summary: This tool give you convenient way to check and modify many texture paths in one NIF file.
descriptionHtml:
[color=lightblue][b]Name:		Mesh tool N4 - PathExtractor[/b][/color]
Data:		20/08/2013
Version:	1.00
Author:		Anton


[heading][color=yellow]Description:[/color][/heading]
This program allow you to export all texture paths from NIF to TXT file. 
Then you can easily check it for errors, modify if needed, and import back to NIF file.
(work with NIF block [BSShaderTextureSet]).


[heading][color=yellow]Features:[/color][/heading]
- convenient way to check and modify many texture paths in one NIF file.


[heading][color=yellow]How to use it:[/color][/heading]
This program is supposed to be used at command prompt. (Start->Run->\"cmd.exe\")
But i strongly recommend to use file managers like Total Commander or Far to work with command prompt.
If you run the tool without parameters you will see a little help about it.


---> [color=lightblue][b]Example: \"PathExtractor Model.nif\"[/b][/color]
Tool will make new file with name \"Model.txt\", and save here all found paths from NIF file.
---> [color=lightblue][b]Example: \"PathExtractor Model.nif Model.txt\"[/b][/color]
Tool imports back to NIF file all paths from \"Model.txt\".


[heading][color=yellow]List of parameters:[/color][/heading]
First  - name of NIF file to work with
Second - name of TXT file, where tool will take data to import
  (if TXT file is not mentioned, tool will make a new one and export data to it)
Third  - (optional) \"-q\" - remove ALL questions and confirmations


[heading][color=yellow]Issues:[/color][/heading]
(none found, ... yet :))


[heading][color=yellow]License:[/color][/heading]
Don\'t modify or re-upload this tool without my permission.


[heading][color=yellow]Credits:[/color][/heading]
NifSkope team for NifSkope
Microsoft for Visual Studio 2010 Express
Bethesda for the Game
author: Anton
